notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: TE, GF, SH, and MJ wrote and edited the manuscript. IA, MV, RG, HT, and MH contributed to extensive and overall reviewing of the manuscript. GF, MH, SH, and MJ designed the experiments. IA and MV performed the experiments. TE and GF were involved in collection and management of the experimental data. TE, GF, and JB performed experimental data analysis and statistics. TE, GF, SH, and MJ were tasked with biological interpretation of the data. All authors gave their full consent with regard to accountability, responsibility, quality, and integrity of the data and interpretation thereof, as reported in the final manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
